thread.title: Great Option for a luxury hotel in Paris
thread.title_full: Great Option for a luxury hotel in Paris - Review of Grand Hotel du Palais Royal, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: gwera
title: Great Option for a luxury hotel in Paris
text: We stayed here for a nice getaway. Finding a nice hotel in Paris can be a challenge. This place has a fantastic location and really great people. We were granted an early checkin which I really appreciated as we arrived tired. The room itself is small but modern. I would stay again. Thanks to the bellman with the $2 bill for help on checkout.
